Articles.Content: You don't have wait for Apple to see what a foldable iPhone would look like in practice. China-based The Aesthetics of Science and Technology (AST) claims to have built a folding iPhone through heavy modifications. The engineers say they created the one-off w…

Articles.Title: The Polar Ignite 3 comes with a daily ‘alertness’ forecast
Articles.Content: The $329.95 Polar lgnite 3 fitness watch introduces SleepWise, a new feature that analyzes your sleep and circadian rhythms to deliver a daily “alertness” forecast. It also adds multiband GPS and in-training voice guidance.

Articles.Content: Apple says most M2- and M1-based computers only support 1 external monitor.

Articles.Title: Amazon and Apple 'Colluded' to Make iPhone and iPad More Expensive, Says Antitrust Lawsuit
Articles.Content:
Apple and Amazon worked together to raise the price of iPhones and iPads by eliminating third-party Amazon sellers who offered Apple products at a lower cost, according to a new antitrust lawsuit filed today in Washington.





The complaint, filed by Hagens …

Articles.Title: Asian shares fall ahead of U.S. CPI, crypto worries mount
Articles.Content: Asian share markets were tense on Thursday and the dollar held on to its overnight gains before the big test of a U.S. consumer inflation report, while market sentiment took a dive as the likely collapse of a major crypto exchange spooked investors.

Articles.Content: If you're looking for one of the fastest streaming devices on the market, Amazon has you covered with the Fire TV Cube (2022). Just be prepared to deal with a few caveats while trying to find something to watch.
